showerReviews.reviewerName: Dump trucks and semi trucks for sale For sale
showerReviews.reviewText: ‚ÄúFlo, Christ, and all the staff are always very attentive. Congratulations on keeping the place exceptionally clean.‚Äù
showerReviews.uniqueId: Dump trucks and semi trucks for sale For sale_‚ÄúFlo,_Christ,_and_all_the_staff_are_always_very_at_a week ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Once again, Love‚Äôs delivers. Clean facility, affordable gas, fresh food, spotless showers‚Äîand above all, genuine kindness from the staff. I stopped in for a shower and left feeling not only clean, but truly taken care of. Thank you to the ‚Ä¶

This is one of the nicest Loves I hate been to. It was very clean and modern. The cashier and employees were super friendly and this place has a wide variety of hot dogs, coffee, drinks and snacks. The bathrooms are very clean and there is a Subway connected to the truck stop.

Shower door doesn‚Äôt any extra safety locks ! Someone just entered on when I was showering! These people gave him the shower at same time as me ! Make sure your shower has an extra lock on the door _ as you can see in the picture it‚Äôs does ‚Ä¶

5*** stars! Traveling through th Carolinas during the late hours looks like a ghost town. Barely a anything open. Was starving, found love and it was like an oasis in the desert with a subway open. Plenty of items to eat. Nice staff and clean bathrooms! Was able to fill car up also

Stopped to get gas here when traveling. Very clean store. Bathrooms were so clean, and I loved how each stall felt more private than your normal basic public restroom. We got food from the subway inside which was also very clean, helpful staff and food was good.
This is a very clean station full of facilities and very well managed! I loved it so much! Very clean restrooms, many souvenirs. Including a subway and lots of food!

showerReviews.reviewText: At least it was a place to park. Not a lot of space there though.  Tried to get a shower at 06:00 but nobody had cleaned the showers so I was refused.  $10/ night for parking.  Not a bad price.

1 star only because the water was hot.  Anyone who says this place is worth stopping at for a shower is full of you know what.  Disgusting, and I felt like I needed another shower after I was getting dressed bc it was so hot in there.  I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Plus the store is filthy and the bathroom is disgusting. Don't plan on taking a shower here unless you want to invite  a fungus to ride along with you.
Always my stopping point outside of the base. $12 shower and a subway. They also have cooks on during the day.
Paid overnight parking only. Restrooms were gross. Only one person per shower, so if you're a couple go somewhere else.
Needed a shower this place was cheap and clean. A little out the way from where I live but I would go again if needed to shower

showerReviews.reviewText: One of the largest and cleanest Truck stops I've ever been to. Disabled parking and access,  deisel, restrooms, wheelchair access, hot food, gift shop, massive coffee bar and cold drink area, a Wendy's,  a Subway, an Iron Skillet ‚Ä¶

This place is awesome. Don't dare just stop for gas, you have to go in and check this place out. They have a huge selection of items to buy, big clean restrooms, and food choices. Staff was busy but still attentive and ready to service with no wait.
Easy in and out. Auto-open doors at the entrance. The bathrooms were good, lots is stalls. But several toilets were clogged. This was on a Saturday around 11:45am. ‚Ä¶
very clean truck stop, nice people, clean shower rooms. the best petro travel stop i ever seen in the country.
Clean and convenient. Pleasant giant truck stop with a blue beacon and iron skillet. I needed to do laundry and the facilities were clean with large machines. Good place to do a reset here.

I just got to my truck after my shower and I was impressed with the maintenance man "B" that went above and beyond. He offered me an extra towel and washcloth. He was very respectful with "yes sir" and "no sir"  Other employees should take ‚Ä¶

no showers! i ordered tru pilot app shower and was waiting for almost 1 hr and nothing. went to front desk and spoke with manager and she said that showers are not ready because they are waiting for employees to clean! showers should be ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: The facilities are very clean as well as the interior building. The exterior appeared clean as well. I will say that this is not the typical full-size pilot. I think it has maybe four truck fuel stations for the 18 wheelers. Other than that, I think it will meet all your needs.
Spent here more than an hour in the line for a shower. First and single person in line. Come on, we are truckers don‚Äôt have some much free time. Every minute is priceless. I‚Äôm still waiting.
Nasty and new employees are rude. There is always either truckers or people who live in their cars washing themselves in the bathroom sinks. Coffee here sucks. Go to circle K
I waited 2 hours to get my shower washed! This is the worst place.

Amazing service , stuff friendly, showers really clean.
Not a lot of parking spots but place is  really good , quiet

The greeting was great but the shower was disgusting. Old Nails on the floor. No counter. Tape to hold the shower curtain.

I came here to simply take a shower; but was introduced by racial sweet-tarts. I can't and will never understand how a place with African- American employees could posses racist counter parts. It's scary that,  I of color, can walk into an ‚Ä¶

We love this place!!! Lots of parking, we can always count on a clean shower, and the friendly staff. Also plenty of food choices, from 4 different fast food restaurants, to the Iron Skillet full service restaurant. It's a regular stop for ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Problem was told they couldn‚Äôt get me in until 10 am the next Morning 9/4/21 okay find it‚Äôs been a long day so I grab a Hot Shower ( The Best ) and had dinner. Did a little Shopping  Great Customer Service (Chef Chris Edmandson) Cook the ‚Ä¶

Very friendly atmosphere. Several food choices include fast food or  full blown meal. Very clean.   Geared around the trucking industry  but great for all travelers. Shower and rest room facilities are clean

One of my favorite truck stops. Took a shower üöø then looked around the store. I ended up buying two half inch chains and some rugs for my truck.  Next time I get there I'll probably buy two more chains and some binders. ‚Ä¶

I have always liked the big Petro Travel stores. As a truck driver the big shower they have is awesome for a husband and wife. The young black man with blonde tips always has those showers spotless. That young man needs a raise!  The store ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Chrome and accessory shop it's a little pricey but it is convenient. Plenty of parking. Clean shower. The restaurant though is one of the worst I've seen in a Petro. Store manager is aware of the bad restaurant and said that they are ‚Ä¶
Cool truck stop. Pretty clean. Lots of parking. You will wait for a shower most times. Always busy, but the fuel island is usually wide open.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ and was still super friendly. The cook came out and  he was super friendly. I'm glad to have places like this out here compared to the major chains. I didn't inquire about the shower since I had one this morning so I can't comment on that.
Pics of shower and some mold on the curtains. Good place to park and get snacks. Would recommend finding a shower elsewhere.

‚Ä¶ was free(I think)Nice amount of parking, Good service, Quiet area and some on site cooked food which I enjoyed their fried catfish. However, the shower bathrooms was'nt working this time that I came. So, make sure you get some shower wipes

‚Ä¶ because of this; when you spend hundreds of dollars for fuel and are told that you should chose between the shower or the parking is completely ridiculous, all truck chains offer free parking and shower with the purchase of 60 gallons ‚Ä¶

10 bucks parking after 5pm, 10 bucks for a shower, Restaurant is closed down until health inspector okays it to open, 2 bucks for a cup of warm old coffee, but hey its 11 minutes away from Wal-Mart Sam's if you have business there as I do ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ employee around with a knife he was really looking to cut/kill someone. On top of that the attitude of the entire staff is terrible. I think the owner might be racist. The building is horrible, no one should try taking a shower in there.

Was charged parking, even after we ate in their restaurant, when staff told us we would have to pay. Shower, we're very unkept. It will do in a pinch but would stay somewhere instead. A last resort truck stop.

Would give 0 stars 10.00 to park mostly a gravel lot full of potholes.  10.00 for a shower. Have to get 100 gal of fuel for free parking or a shower. There fuel prices are ridiculous  NO REAL FOOD. The is absurd for our truckers you should ‚Ä¶
I pay $8.00 for an nasty shower. The services sucks, parking lot nasty. It need to be shut down n rebuild it. Lots of upgrade needed. I will never stop here again. I'm a truck driver..
Well it seems like a cle an truck stop. But 10 dollars to park10 dollars for shower, no real food,what a joke, must fuel 100 gallons for free shower,another joke,Will never stop here again
